messages.message:
TEKsystems - Architect Opportunity!

Hi Brian, 

I hope youâ€™re having a great week so far! I am sure you get several of these per day, so I will keep it brief. I was hoping to reach you because I specialize within Infrastructure and Security specific opportunities with TEKsystems. I am not sure if you are open to new opportunities at the moment, but I was hoping to speak with you about a position we have available for an Application Security Architect. Our client is based out of Memphis, TN; however, this resource can sit remotely from Phoenix.

Let me know if this is something you're interested in and if there is a time we can connect to discuss in further detail. If anything, maybe you know someone who might be interested. 

Thanks, and I look forward to hearing back from you soon! 

Hayley

Hayley Perdzock
901.415.1005 | hperdzoc@teksystems.com
Thank you for connecting! What company?
The client only has a call center in your area, all of IT sits in Memphis but they will allow this resource to report there. Let me know if you're interested in discussing.
